name: Archer
description: Equipped with a bow and arrow, this warrior provides valuable long-range attacks. May Aim for higher damage...

name: Bard
description: A warrior who uses his voice as a weapon. May use Bardsong to support his allies in battle...

name: Black Mage
description: A warrior who uses Black Magicks to channel elemental powers into powerful offensive spells...

name: Calculator
description: A learned warrior who uses Arithmeticks to analyze natural phenomena and pinpoint magickal attacks...

name: Chemist
description: An expert in the use of items to recover HP or remove vexing status ailments...

name: Dancer
description: A warrior who dances across the battlefield, garbed in colorful raiments...

name: Dragoon
description: A warrior who may make soaring Jump attacks even in full armor, the dragoon is also a master spearman...

name: Geomancer
description: A warrior who uses Geomancy to control powers lying dormant in the natural terrain...

name: Knight
description: A brave and chivalrous warrior of unmatched skill. Uses a knight's sword to unleash the Arts of War...

name: Orator
description: A warrior who participates in battle using Speechcraft. Words, rather than swords, are the orator's weapons...

name: Mime
description: A warrior who has abandoned his or her own identity, instead mimicking the actions of allies in battle...

name: Monk
description: A warrior, devoted to physical training, whose unarmed attacks are deadly. May use Martial Arts...

name: Mystic
description: A warrior who uses the Mystic Arts to bend the forces of the cosmos to his or her will...

name: Ninja
description: A warrior who uses stealth to be all but invisible. The ninja may also Throw weapons at faraway enemies...

name: Samurai
description: Following a warrior ethic from a foreign land, the samurai uses Iaido techniques to attack with his or her katana...

name: Squire
description: This job serves as the foundation for all others, forming the first step on the road to becoming a legendary warrior...

name: Summoner
description: A warrior who may Summon the most powerful of spirits, the beings known as espers...

name: Thief
description: Warriors who can steal anything from anyone. Their skill is legendary...

name: Time Mage
description: The Time Mage controls time and space. This sorcerer toys with the laws of the universe...

name: Dark Knight
description: This warrior exchanges life for power, using Darkness to disintegrate all who stand before him...

name: Onion Knight
description: Although able to equip all weapons, this sad warrior excels at none, and is far from being the most powerful...

name: Sword Saint
description: A peerless warrior who commands an entire knightly order. It is said that none can match his swordplay...

name: Sky Pirate
description: A pirate who sails the open sky, free from all laws and obligations. He never lets a mark escape...

name: White Mage
description: A warrior who taps into the powers of the divine, using White Magicks to cast spells of recovery and protection...
